result.execSummary:
All charges against Desmond M.D. Clemons in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Desmond M.D. Clemons is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Desmond M.D. Clemons not in court.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
NO COURT FILE. The defendant arrested is not Mr. Clemons. On motion of the defense, Court ordered case dismissed.
No reply from defendant or surety. DZ
Defendant's Bail Forfeiture Notice returned undeliverable.
JusticePoint Discharge Summary received and filed.
Notice of bail forfeiture mailed to surety and defendant; Original in file. ($500.00) gj
Cash bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 500.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Christina E. Balistreri in court.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court orders all cash bail forfeited and vacates the 6-8-2016 trial date.    COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Defense called court to request 1 day adjournment of final pretrial from 5/16/2016 to 5/17/2016. Request granted. Case adjourned to 5/17/2016 at 8:15 in Branch 38. Defense to notify defendant and the state.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Desmond M.D. Clemons in court with attorney Mark A. Pecora.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Pecora informs the court that the defendant has paid half of the retainer and if defendant fails to uphold their financial agreement he will have to withdraw.    Case set for final pretrial on 5-16-2016 at 8:15am.  Jury trial set for 6-8-2016 at 8:15am.  All final pretrial documents to be filed by the final pretrial hearing.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 16, 2016 at 08:15 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 8, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Desmond M.D. Clemons in court.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter before the Court for Status conference as to new counsel.  Defendant meeting with private counsel today for the purpose of paying retainer fee.  
The Court reviews JusticPoint report with the defendant.  Statement made by defendant.  The Court admonishes the defendant.  The Court grants short adjournment.  Status conference scheduled for April 6, 2016 at 08:15 am.
JusticePoint Report, received and filed.
VIOLATION REPORT SUBMITTED DUE TO MISSED OFFICE CONTACT. kl
from SPD, defendant does NOT qualify.

Defendant Desmond M.D. Clemons in court with attorney Victoria Mccandless.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney McCandless informs court that defendant is not SPD eligible.  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.  Case is adjourned for status of counsel to 4-1-2016.  Status conference scheduled for April 1, 2016 at 08:15 am.

records.addlTxt: JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Desmond M.D. Clemons in court with attorney Victoria Mccandless.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense counsel informs the court that she miscalendared this matter for 4-4-2016 and is requesting a new trial date.  Also, the defendant may not be eligible for SPD representation any longer.  Court refers defendant to SPD office for re-evaluation after court and sets for status on 3-17-2016.  Trial date of 4-4-2016 is vacated.  Status conference scheduled for March 17, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Desmond M.D. Clemons in court with attorney Victoria Mccandless.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case set for final pretrial on 3-11-2016 at 8:15am.  Jury trial set for 4-4-2016 at 8:15am.  All final pretrial documents to be filed by the final pretrial hearing.  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 11, 2016 at 08:15 am.  Jury trial scheduled for April 4, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Justice Point Violation Report - missed office contact - received and filed. Court will address the violation at the next court date. Deputy Court Clerk ccp.

Defendant Desmond M.D. Clemons in court with attorney Victoria Mccandless.  James Griffin for Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is reassigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38 as of February 1, 2016 due to Judicial Rotation.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference to Branch 25.  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 15, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Filed, Justice Point Pretrial Report dated 1/21/16.

No driving without a valid license.  Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by portable breathalyzers.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Desmond M.D. Clemons in court with attorney Victoria Mccandless.  Defendant Desmond M.D. Clemons in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rothstein, Branch 25.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  Defense entered a plea of NOT GUILTY as to Count 2.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 22, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
